issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.tumblr.com/g5mlp/722197667027025920/the-entire-my-little-pony-2024-franchise-overview](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tumblr.com%2Fg5mlp%2F722197667027025920%2Fthe-entire-my-little-pony-2024-franchise-overview) ### Comment Username: @DandelionSprout > While not logged in, an uncloseable login prompt when scrolling down on not only frontpages, but also very long individual posts nowadays. > > Since the mass exodus from Twitter to Tumblr seems to me personally like it'd warrant fast treatment, I'll let you guys borrow `www.tumblr.com#?##glass-container:has(p + p):has(a[href^="/auth/google?"])` from Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List into AdGuard Popups Filters with no reservations or conditions of any kind. Alternately you guys can also use whichever entries you guys would write. > > The entry has worked for at least 2 months now, even if there still may be other Tumblr-side annoyances remaining (Most notably that the ••• buttons don't work after scrolling down slightly, which I never found a good fix for). ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/3ile3nh8woe884w0k8gog4kw0k4gsg86bgh67exwww.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBO 1.50.0 + I Don't Care About Cookies 3.4.7 Browser: | Chrome Filters: | Ad Blocking:

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Safari

### AdGuard version

4.5.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://ielts.idp.com/results/check-your-result

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/156801#issuecomment-1641498508
>Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce this issue.

I cannot reproduce it either (it's fixed by a rule from AdGuard Base filter on my end).
You can try to add this rule:
```adblock
gktoday.in#$#body div.fc-ab-root:not(#style_important) { display: none !important; }
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/156776#issuecomment-1641245896 - It seems that it's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, so please disable it or add this rule:
```adblock
bing.com#@$##b_tq_header, .header, .sbox { position: absolute !important; }
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
여전히 재구현이 되지 않습니다.
AdGuard for Android 최신 버전 (v4.0 안정 채널) 기준으로 확인하실 수 있는 항목들을 알려드리겠습니다:
1. 제 3자 VPN 앱이 있고 이 VPN이 활성화된 경우 [^1]
2. Android 프라이빗 DNS 설정이 `시용 안함`이 아닌 경우
3. AdGuard 보호 탭에서 `광고와 팝업 차단`이 비활성화된 경우
4. AdGuard 설정 탭 -> 필터링 -> 앱 -> 앱 관리 -> `실시간 지하철`에서 `AdGuard를 통한 트래픽 라우팅` 또는 `앱 콘텐츠 필터링`이 비활성화된 경우
5. AdGuard 보호 탭 -> 광고와 팝업 차단 -> 사용자 규칙에서 `googleads.g.doubleclick.net`이나 `exam.RealtimeSubway` 텍스트가 들어가 있는 규칙이 존재하는 경우
6. AdGuard for Android에 AdGuard 프리미엄 라이선스가 활성화되지 않은 경우 [^2]


[^1]: Android의 VPN 설정에서 AdGuard 앱에 대해 VPN 연결이 되고 있다고 나와야합니다.
[^2]: AdGuard 설정 탭 -> 라이선스

Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. comment.body:
Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

* Remove affiliate.productreview.com.au

* Remove analytics.anvato.net

* Remove analytics.femalefirst.co.uk

* Remove analytics.jabong.com

* Remove analytics.ma.tune.com

* Remove collect.albacross.com

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Missed ads on chrome://newtab
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.13.2 (build 4287, CL 1.11.114)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

chrome://newtab

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, I don't care about cookies

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Block WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value)

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>There is no option to block the ads on chrome://newtab using Adguard browser helper because it's inactive
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![newtab_1](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/139629821/61c9dba3-d309-40ec-955f-4449783af0f3)


</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![newtab_2](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/139629821/8965a7a3-f5bb-4364-86e3-472413122392)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: skyserial.video

AdGuard for Android

4.0.912

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Cannot access the following URL in the app's internal browser. https://www.ksdenki.com/sp/app/anpass/customer/topmenu.aspx

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
   1) Install "K's Denki Anshin Passport App" from the Play Store.
   2) Open "K's Denki Anshin Passport App" and tap "Click here to register".
   3) An error message "Communication could not be established" appears.
   4) The page that should be displayed is supposed to be blocked.
   5) When AdGuard is disabled or the DNS filter function of AdGuard is disabled, the "K's Denki Anshin Passport App" behaves correctly
We wish to exclude pages under the following directories from communication blocking.
https://www.ksdenki.com/sp/app/anpass/

comment.body:
Where it can be downloaded?
Could you please create an account for us and send it to filters@adguard.com?

> 5) When AdGuard is disabled or the DNS filter function of AdGuard is disabled, the "K's Denki Anshin Passport App" behaves correctly

so the app is broken by DNS filtering module?
If so - please disable all filters, except DNS filter, switch to non-filtered DNS and clear the filtering log. Then reproduce an issue and go to the filtering log. Filter out blocked requests and make screenshots.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.50.1b17

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.instagram.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Other Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
To reproduce: log on to an Instagram account and have some people followed.
When you try to right click some images, it won't let you save or open the image in a new tab, though adding `instagram.com##._aagw` will allow you to. It doesn't seem to have any functionality besides trying to prevent downloading/saving of Instagram images on your feed.
